channel.title: Indigesteams on Schulich Ignite
channel.description: Recent content in Indigesteams on Schulich Ignite

item.title: Variables and If-Statements
item.description: In this session, we will take a deeper look into using variables in our programs by exploring variable scope, combining variables, and a new data type: booleans!

item.title: Introduction to Python
item.description: In this session, we will get set up on our coding platform, take a look at what programming is, and begin writing our first lines of code!
